snippet.title: No More Room in Hell Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Download No More Room in Hell on Steam: http://www.nmrih.com/download/

When there is no more room in hell, the dead will walk the earth.

We are proud to announce a release date for our Steam release. Hell is overflowing to the brink. On Halloween it will spill over into the mouth of society. Your cute little floaties will not be enough to keep you alive in the tidal wave that is about to hit. Now stock up and get hyped with this release trailer!

Trailer theme: https://soundcloud.com/thoughtmusic/no-more-room-in-hell-steam

No More Room in Hell is a free-to-play, co-operative classic zombie survival game. Originally a Half-Life 2 total conversion, it will be available via Steam digital distribution October 31st, 2013 as a free standalone game. It is currently in Beta stages. Development will continue after release.

Trailer score by Garrett "ThoughT" Lindquist  https://soundcloud.com/thoughtmusic
Filmed, directed and edited by Chase "Xendrid" Asch
Thanks to our testers for making the trailer possible: Krackman, Bruce Campbell, Joshikumako, 2ndClassCitizen, DarK_St3alth, Abilities, Preston

Join us: http://www.nomoreroominhell.com
@nmrih
http://www.facebook.com/nmrih
http://www.moddb.com/mods/no-more-room-in-hell

Our official Steam group: http://steamcommunity.com/games/224260
